name: Graveyard Smashers
description:
Graveyard Smashers is a spooky mini-game put together by Jenni with some C# help from Shade. Most of the game dev for this 5 minute game was done while streaming live on Twitch! Please enjoy.

Run around a lovely graveyard using WASD. Use your mouse button to stun enemies & smash as many pumpkins as you can, before the time is up.
:-D
